title: Shape Overlapping Issue
description: Some shapes may occasionally overlap during gameplay. This is a known issue that we are actively working on. If you encounter this issue, please report it to support@infinitumlive.com with details about when it occurred and any steps to reproduce it.

title: How to Report Bugs
description:
If you encounter any issues while playing Infinitum Block Smash, please report them to our support team at support@infinitumlive.com. Please include as much detail as possible, such as:

• When the issue occurred
• What you were doing when it happened
• Steps to reproduce the issue
• Screenshots or videos if possible

Your feedback helps us improve the game for everyone!
